description:
At Davis & Brusca, LLC, in Princeton, New Jersey, we offer the highest level of advocacy and support for those who have suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Davis & Brusca, LLC, is a highly rated specialty law firm concentrating on Nursing Home Abuse & Neglect, wrongful death and serious personal injury. Our team of highly rated and award-winning attorneys possess decades of combined experience fighting for the rights of people who have been harmed by the negligence of others, in any of the following ways:

• Nursing home abuse & neglect
• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Bicycle and pedestrian accidents
• Wrongful death
• Other preventable tragedies

For more than 20 years, our lawyers have helped hundreds of individuals and families during their most dire times of need. Through our passion for justice and our unwavering commitment to those we serve, we aggressively pursue justice for our clients and will seek to recover the maximum compensation possible for medical bills, lost wages and other damages caused by the negligent and reckless conduct of others.

We understand the stress and anxiety you are likely feeling, and you can trust Davis & Brusca to provide you with personalized, compassionate counsel you deserve as we work tirelessly to help you obtain the security and relief you need. The lawyers and staff at Davis & Brusca are deeply committed to providing you with a high level of service and support. Our attorneys have received top marks from both our clients and peers, and we hold an AV-Preeminent peer review rating* from Martindale-Hubbell, so you can trust us with your most sensitive legal issues.

For a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Davis & Brusca, LLC, by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a consultation. We work on a contingency basis, and will not seek a fee from you unless we recover compensation on your behalf.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
